mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.phone AS "phone", a.zipcode AS "zipcode", a.province_code AS "provinceCode", a.city_code AS "cityCode", a.area_code AS "areaCode", a.detail_address AS "detailAddress", a.address AS "address", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_address( id, name, phone, zipcode, province_code, city_code, area_code, detail_address, address, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{zipcode}, #{provinceCode}, #{cityCode}, #{areaCode}, #{detailAddress}, #{address}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE order_address SET name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, province_code = #{provinceCode}, city_code = #{cityCode}, area_code = #{areaCode}, detail_address = #{detailAddress}, address = #{address}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
